mapper.insert:
insert into p2p_cash_flow ( borrow_id, return_date_no, trade_date, month_payment, principal, interest, manage_fee, remain_principal, paid_principal, create_time, update_time, creator, reviser, logic_state, biz_state ) values
( #{item.borrowId}, #{item.returnDateNo}, #{item.tradeDate}, #{item.monthPayment}, #{item.principal}, #{item.interest}, #{item.manageFee}, #{item.remainPrincipal}, #{item.paidPrincipal}, #{item.createTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.creator}, #{item.reviser}, #{item.logicState}, #{item.bizState} )
